metadata.title: CVE-2024-26881 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:hns3: fix kernel crash when 1588 is received on HIP08 devices The HIP08devices does not register the ptp devices, so the hdev->ptp is NULL, butthe hardware can receive 1588 messages, and set the HNS3_RXD_TS_VLD_B bit,so, if match this case, the access of hdev->ptp->flags will cause a kernelcrash: [ 5888.946472] Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference atvirtual address 0000000000000018 [ 5888.946475] Unable to handle kernelNULL pointer dereference at virtual address 0000000000000018 ...
